name: Baldi's Basics: The Ultimate Challenge
description:
Welcome to the ultimate Baldi experience! Story

Ever since you left Baldi's school, he has been awaiting your return, all while gathering up some new friends and getting an epic challenge for you for the next time you come into school after hours.

He waits and waits, but nothing happens. 

Then, one day, your friend loses his notebooks again, so you have to go back into the school to get them. Now, it's only pure survival and strategy that awaits you inside this more twisted schoolhouse. . .

Objective

Collect all 7 notebooks and exit the school, just like the original. Simple, right? NOT EVEN CLOSE. 

This time around, Baldi got a cast of new friends to harass you. They have harder mechanics and creepy designs to prove that you have little chance against Baldi's crew of friends.

There's also some brand new items. You can gulp down a potion to get some speed (more than a Zesty Bar, in fact!), wave a stick to flip upside down and even use a remote to completely wipe Baldi off the face of the earth. . .for a while, anyway.

Also, the school lighting will frequently change, just to keep things random and unique.

So you think you can still survive Baldi's truly ultimate challenge?? WELL THEN, PLAY IT!!

Thanks for checking out my mod!

This is my first official Baldi mod, and I truly worked hard to get it done for everyone to play. Even if you play it for just a few minutes, thank you SO MUCH for playing this game. It was an astounding journey developing this mod, and I hope you have the same feeling as you play through this mod!

Also, I will do a few small updates, so keep an eye out for those.
